smoothies.name: Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1.25 cups unsweetened almond milk (or more, to taste)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients for your green smoothie into a high-speed blender or Vitamix and blend until smooth.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender and mix on high until smooth. Option to add a little bit more orange juice depending on how thick/thin you like your smoothies. Serve immediately.

smoothies.name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Add more almond milk as needed. Serve immediately.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Banana Spinach Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: First, line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Then, evenly spread out 2 cups of sliced bananas, 2 cups of whole strawberries. Place in the freezer for about 2 hours or until completely frozen. Next, take 4 quart-size freezer bags and write the date and Strawberry Banana Green Smoothie on the front. Add 1 cup of the frozen fruit, a handful of spinach, and a teaspoon of chia seeds to each bag. Before sealing, make sure you squeeze as much air out as possible to prevent freezer burn. Seal and place in the freezer for later use. Once you’re ready to blend, empty contents of spinach smoothie bag into a high-speed blender. Then, add about 1/2 cup of almond milk and 2 tablespoons of your favorite protein powder. Blend on high for about 1 minute or until everything is blended.

smoothies.name: Triple Berry Protein Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender and mix until smooth.

smoothies.name: Healthy Banana Protein Smothie
ingredients: ¾ cup nonfat Greek yogurt, frozen into cubes
¼ cup vanilla protein powder (we used Garden of Life Raw Organic Protein)
2 cups milk, any kind (we used Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Milk)
smoothies.instructions: First, freeze ¾ cup nonfat Greek Yogurt in an ice cube tray. Once the Greek yogurt has fully frozen, place all ingredients for healthy banana shake into a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth and serve with your favorite toppings.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie with Peanut Butter
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender and mix until smooth. Serve with a drizzle of peanut butter and fresh fruit.

smoothies.name: Pumpkin Berry Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high speed blender and blend on high until smooth. Scrape the sides of the blender and add additional almond milk (1 teaspoon at a time) if smoothie is too thick. Blend until smooth. Serve with homemade granola or fruit toppings and enjoy!

smoothies.name: Chocolate Protein Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high for around 1 minute, stopping to scrape the sides. You may need to add more milk to thin as needed. Serve immediately!

smoothies.name: Pumpkin Smoothie
ingredients: 3/4 cup coffee, cold (I just used leftover from the morning’s pot!)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high for around 1 minute, stopping to scrape the sides if needed. Serve immediately with your favorite whipped topping.

smoothies.name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high speed blender and blend until smooth.

smoothies.name: Pomegranate Green Smoothie
ingredients: toppings: hemp seeds, pomegranate arils, pistachio nuts, and dark chocolate
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high speed food processor and mix until smooth. You may need to add a bit more pomegranate juice depending on how thick you like your smoothies.

smoothies.name: Apple Pie Smoothie
ingredients: optional: handful of fresh spinach or kale
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth. Serve with lots of fixings on top!

smoothies.name: Apple Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened almond milk (or any kind of milk)
smoothies.instructions: First, freeze 90gr apple sauce cups for at least 2 hours or overnight. Once frozen, run the applesauce cups under hot water for a few seconds to remove from the plastic. Then place into a high-speed blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and cover. Blend on high for around a minute or until smooth.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Pineapple Smoothie
ingredients: 1.5 cups almond milk, unsweetened (or more to taste)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients for your strawberry pineapple smoothie into a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Depending on how frozen your fruit is, you may need to add more almond milk. Serve with extra fresh pineapple chunks on the bottom.

smoothies.name: Magical Orange Creamsicle Smoothie
ingredients: optional: 1 scoop vanilla protein powder, coconut whipped cream, orange zest
smoothies.instructions: Place frozen bananas, vanilla extract, and orange juice into a high-speed blender and blend until smooth. Option at this point to add a handful of ice (depending on thickness preference) and/or other add-ins such as vanilla protein powder and fresh orange zest. Blend one more time and then serve immediately.

smoothies.name: Mango Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Eat immediately.

smoothies.name: Kale Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Option to add more orange juice as needed to thin things out. Serve smoothie immediately and top with your favorite toppings.

smoothies.name: Carrot Cake Smoothie
ingredients: 1 large carrot, roughly chopped (or grated if you don’t have a high speed blender)
Extra finely grated carrot for mixing in, optional
Sprinkle of nutmeg, freshly grated is EXTRA delicious
½–1 cup of liquid, I typically use non-dairy milk and then add in water if I want it a bit more liquidy
smoothies.instructions: In a high speed blender, blend all ingredients (minus the additional carrot) together until creamy and smooth. If desired, mix in additional finely grated carrot (highly recommend!). Top with a few chopped walnuts and ENJOY!

smoothies.name: Golden Milk Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon turmeric (you could totally leave this out if you want a plain mango smoothie!)
1 frozen banana or 1 cup of cauliflower
optional: splash of milk or water if you need help getting the blender going
smoothies.instructions: In a high speed blender, combine all of the ingredients and blend until smooth. If needed, add more liquid, a tablespoon at a time, to get the blender going. I like my smoothies on the thicker side but add some milk/ water as needed. Serve and ENJOY.

smoothies.name: Caramel Apple Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1 frozen banana (could leave this out but sub for a few ice cubes)
almond milk (could substitute for apple juice for a stronger apple taste)
sprinkle of cinnamon (or a couple sprinkles)
smoothies.instructions: Add all of the ingredients (minus the caramel) to a high speed blender and blend on high. Drizzle a little of the caramel sauce around your glass and pour the smoothie into the glass. Top with a bit more of the caramel sauce and ENJOY.

smoothies.name: Oatmeal Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup old-fashioned oats or quick oats
1 banana chopped into chunks and frozen
1/2 tablespoon pure maple syrup plus additional to taste
1/8 teaspoon kosher salt don’t skip this, as it makes the oatmeal pop
smoothies.instructions: Place the oats in the bottom of a blender and pulse a few times until finely ground. Add the banana, milk, peanut butter, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt. Blend until smooth and creamy, stopping to scrape down the blender as needed. Taste and add additional sweetener if you’d like a sweeter smoothie. Enjoy immediately.

smoothies.name: Grapefruit Smoothie
ingredients: grapefruit segments, berries and granola (for topping)
smoothies.instructions: Segment grapefruit over a bowl so you can collect all the juice. Set 2-3 segments aside for topping. Add grapefruit segments, grapefruit juice, frozen pineapple, Greek yogurt, coconut oil and fresh ginger into a high-powered blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust ingredients based on your preference. If smoothie is too thick you can add a little non-dairy milk. Pour into two glasses and enjoy. Or serve in a bowl with your favorite toppings — grapefruit segments, granola, berries, etc.

smoothies.name: Paleo Purple Sweet Potato Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup cubed purple sweet potato, pre-cooked & frozen
smoothies.instructions: Add all ingredients to blender cup. Blend until smooth. Add more (or less) liquid for desired consistency. I used 1 cup of milk and it was fairly thick. Add more liquid or milk to drink through straw.

smoothies.name: Chai Pumpkin Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 2 Medjool dates, pitted (or sub another sweetener such as 1/2 TBS maple syrup)
1/2 cup pumpkin puree* (option to freeze into cubes)
2/3 cup*** cashew milk (or milk of choice)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into blender cup starting with AllWhites® 100% liquid egg whites, ending with cashew milk. See notes below regarding frozen pumpkin versus fresh and amount of milk needed. Blend until smooth. Transfer pumpkin protein smoothie into cup or travel mug, enjoy!

smoothies.name: Creamy Citrus Ginger Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup coconut milk (or milk of choice)
1 1″ cube fresh ginger, skin removed and chopped
smoothies.instructions: Add all of the ingredients into blender – make sure your oranges are segmented if you prefer a more pulp-free orange juice. 2. Blend until smooth. Add more ice or liquid for desired consistency.

smoothies.name: Antioxidant Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Combine all ingredients, including almond milk, in a high speed blender. Blend until creamy, adding additional almond milk if necessary.

smoothies.name: Coffee Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk or milk of choice
1/2 cup freshly brewed organic coffee or cold brew, place in fridge for 10 minutes
1 scoop protein powder (I like Vital Proteins Collagen Peptides)
Optional: 1 teaspoon honey or sweetener of choice
smoothies.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a high speed blender. Blend until creamy. Taste and add additional sweetener if needed.

smoothiesSER.name: Zeleni Smoothie
ingredients: 1.25 šolje nezaslađenog bademovog mleka (ili više, po ukusu)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke za zeleni smoothie stavite u brzi blender ili Vitamik i blendajte dok ne postane homogeno.

smoothiesSER.name: Jagoda Smoothie
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite sve sastojke u brzi blender i mešajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno. Mogućnost dodavanja još malo soka od pomorandže u zavisnosti od toga koliko gusti / tanki smoothie volite. Poslužite odmah.

smoothiesSER.name: Kikiriki Banana Smoothie
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite sve sastojke u brzi blender i mešajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno. Po potrebi dodajte još bademovog mleka. Poslužite odmah.

smoothiesSER.name: Jagoda Banana Spanać Smoothie
ingredients: 2 kašike vanilinog proteina u prahu (bilo koje vrste)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Prvo obložite pleh papirom za pečenje. Zatim, ravnomerno rasporedite 2 šolje isečenih banana, 2 šolje celih jagoda. Stavite u zamrzivač na oko 2 sata ili dok se potpuno ne zamrzne. Zatim uzmite 4 kvartene vrećice sa zamrzivačem i na prednju stranu napišite datum i Zeleni smuti od jagode i banane. U svaku kesicu dodajte 1 šolju smrznutog voća, šaku spanaća i kašičicu chia semenki. Pre zaptivanja, proverite da li iscedite što više vazduha kako biste sprečili opekotine zamrzivača. Zatvorite i stavite u zamrzivač za kasniju upotrebu. Jednom kada ste spremni za blendanje, ispraznite sadržaj kesice od špinata u brzi blender. Zatim dodajte oko 1/2 šolje bademovog mleka i 2 kašike vašeg omiljenog proteinskog praha. Mešajte na visokoj temperaturi oko 1 minut ili dok se sve ne pomeša.

smoothiesSER.name: Bobičasti Protein Smoothie
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender i mešajte dok ne postane homogeno.

smoothiesSER.name: Zdravi Banana Protein Smothie
ingredients: ¾ šolje nemasnog grčkog jogurta, smrznutog na kockice
¼ šolje belančevina u prahu u vanili (koristili smo sirovi organski protein Garden of Life)
2 šolje mleka, bilo koje vrste ( nezaslađeno bademovo mleko )
smoothiesSER.instructions: Prvo zamrznite ¾ šolje nemasnog grčkog jogurta u posudi za led. Kada se grčki jogurt potpuno zamrzne, stavite sve sastojke za zdravi šejk od banane u blender velike brzine. Mešajte dok ne postane homogeno i poslužite sa omiljenim prelivima.

smoothiesSER.name: Jagoda Banana Smoothie sa kikiriki buterom
ingredients: 2 kašike potpuno prirodnog kremastog putera od kikirikija
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender i mešajte dok ne postane homogeno. Poslužite uz dodatak kikiriki putera i svežeg voća.

smoothiesSER.name: Bundeva Bobice Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 kašičice začina za pitu od bundeve
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite sve sastojke u blender velike brzine i blendajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno. Ostružite stranice blendera i dodajte dodatno bademovo mleko (1 kašičica odjednom) ako je smoothie pregust. Mešajte dok ne postane glatko. Poslužite sa domaćim prelivima od granole ili voća i uživajte!

smoothiesSER.name: Čokolada Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 šolje čokoladnog proteinskog praha (bilo koje vrste!)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender. Mešajte na visokoj brzini oko 1 minut, zaustavljajući se da biste strugali po stranama. Možda će vam trebati dodati više mleka da se razređuje po potrebi. Služite odmah!

smoothiesSER.name: Bundeva Smoothie
ingredients: 3/4 šolje kafe, hladna (upravo sam iskoristila ostatke jutarnjeg lonca!)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender. Mešajte na visokoj temperaturi oko 1 minutu, zaustavljajući se da biste strugali stranice ako je potrebno. Poslužite odmah uz omiljeni šlag.

smoothiesSER.name: Borovnica Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1 šolja smrznutih banana narezanih na kriške
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite sve sastojke u blender velike brzine i blendajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno.

smoothiesSER.name: Zeleni Smoothie sa narom
ingredients: 1 kašika proteina u prahu od vanile (bilo koje vrste!)
dodaci: seme konoplje, orah od šipka, pistacije i tamna čokolada
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi procesor hrane i mešajte dok ne postane homogeno. Možda će vam trebati da dodate malo više soka od nara, u zavisnosti od toga koliko volite vaš smoothie.

smoothiesSER.name: Jabuka Smoothie I
ingredients: 1/2 šolje nemasnog grčkog jogurta od vanile
opcionalno: šaka svežeg spanaća ili kelja
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender. Mešajte dok ne postane homogeno. Poslužite sa puno fiksiranja na vrhu!

smoothiesSER.name: Jabuka Smoothie II
ingredients: Šolja sosa od jabuka od 90 gr
1 šolja nezaslađenog bademovog mleka (ili bilo koje vrste mleka)
2 kašike putera od oraha (bilo koje vrste)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Prvo zamrznite šolje sosa od jabuka od 90 gr najmanje 2 sata ili preko noći. Jednom zamrznute, stavite šoljice jabuka nekoliko sekundi pod vruću vodu da biste ih uklonili iz plastike. Zatim stavite u blender velike brzine. Dodajte ostatak sastojaka i pokrijte. Mešajte na visokoj temperaturi oko minut ili dok ne postane homogeno.

smoothiesSER.name: Jabuka Ananas Smoothie
ingredients: 1,5 šolje bademovog mleka, nezaslađeno (ili više po ukusu)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke za vaš smoothie od ananasa od jagoda stavite u brzi blender. Mešajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno. U zavisnosti od toga koliko je vaše voće smrznuto, možda ćete morati da dodate još bademovog mleka. Poslužite sa ekstra svežim komadićima ananasa na dnu.

smoothiesSER.name: Magični Smoothie od narandže
ingredients: opcionalno: 1 kašika proteina u prahu od vanile, šlag od kokosa, korica pomorandže
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite smrznute banane, ekstrakt vanile i sok od pomorandže u blender velike brzine i blendajte dok ne postane homogeno. U ovom trenutku možete dodati pregršt leda (u zavisnosti od preferencije debljine) i / ili druge dodatke poput proteina vanile u prahu i sveže korice narandže. Mešajte još jednom, a zatim odmah poslužite.

smoothiesSER.name: Mango Smoothie
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender. Mešajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno. Jedite odmah.

smoothiesSER.name: Kelj Smoothie
smoothiesSER.instructions: Sve sastojke stavite u brzi blender. Mešajte na visokoj brzini dok ne postane homogeno. Mogućnost dodavanja još soka od pomorandže po potrebi za razređivanje stvari. Odmah poslužite smoothie i prelijte omiljenim prelivima.

smoothiesSER.name: Smoothie od šargarepe
ingredients: 1 velika šargarepa, grubo iseckana (ili narendana ako nemate blender velike brzine)
Ekstra fino narendana šargarepa za mešanje, opcionalno
Posuti muškatni oraščić, sveže narendan je DODATNO ukusan
½ – 1 šolja tečnosti, obično koristim nemasno mleko, a zatim dodam vodu ako želim da bude malo tečnija
smoothiesSER.instructions: U blenderu velike brzine spojite sve sastojke (minus dodatnu šargarepu) dok ne postanu kremasti i glatki. Po želji umešajte još sitno narendane šargarepe (toplo preporučujem!). Na vrh dodajte nekoliko seckanih oraha i UŽIVAJTE!

smoothiesSER.name: Smoothie sa mlekom i mangom
ingredients: 1 kašičica kurkume (ovo biste mogli potpuno izostaviti ako želite običan smoothie od manga!)
¾ šolje jogurta bilo koje vrste
opcionalno: prskanje mleka ili vode ako vam je potrebna pomoć u pokretanju blendera
smoothiesSER.instructions: U brzom blenderu kombinirajte sve sastojke i blendajte dok ne postane homogeno. Ako je potrebno, dodajte još tečnosti, supenu kašiku, da bi blender krenuo. Ukoliko je previse gust dodajte malo mleka / vode po potrebi. Služite i UŽIVAJTE.

smoothiesSER.name: Zeleni Smoothie sa karamelom i jabukom
ingredients: 1 smrznuta banana (ovo bi moglo da se izostavi, ali malo za nekoliko kockica leda)
bademovo mleko (može zameniti sok od jabuke za jači ukus jabuke)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Dodajte sve sastojke (minus karamel) u blender velike brzine i blendajte na brzo. Prelijte malo karamel sosa oko čaše i ulijte smoothie u čašu. Prelijte sa malo više sosa od karamele i UŽIVAJTE.

smoothiesSER.name: Smoothie od ovsene kaše
ingredients: 1 banana iseckana na komade i smrznuta
1/2 kašike čistog javorovog sirupa plus dodatak po ukusu
1/8 kašičice košer soli ne preskačite, jer ovsena kaša popinje
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite zob na dno blendera i pulsirajte nekoliko puta dok se fino ne samelje. Dodajte bananu, mleko, puter od kikirikija, javorov sirup, vaniliju, cimet i sol. Mešajte dok ne postane glatko i kremasto, zaustavljajući da biste strugali blender po potrebi. Okusite i dodajte dodatno zaslađivač ako želite slađi smoothie. Uživajte odmah.

smoothiesSER.name: Grapefruit Smoothie
ingredients: delovi grejpa, bobičasto voće i granola (za preliv)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Iseckajte grejpfrut preko posude tako da možete sakupiti sav sok. Odložite 2-3 segmenta na stranu za preliv. Dodajte segment grejpa, sok od grejpa, smrznuti ananas, grčki jogurt, kokosovo ulje i sveži đumbir u blender velike snage i blendajte dok ne postane glatko. Okusite i prilagodite sastojke prema vašim željama. Ako je smuti pregust možete dodati malo nemlečnog mleka. Nalijte u dve čaše i uživajte. Ili poslužite u činiji sa omiljenim prelivima - segmenti grejpa, granola, bobice itd.

smoothiesSER.name: Smoothie od krompira
ingredients: 1 šolja kockanog ljubičastog slatkog krompira, prethodno kuvano i smrznuto
smoothiesSER.instructions: Dodajte sve sastojke u čašu blendera. Mešajte dok ne postane homogeno. Dodajte više (ili manje) tečnosti za željenu konzistenciju. Koristio sam 1 šolju mleka i bilo je prilično gusto. Dodajte više tečnosti ili mleka za piće kroz slamu.

smoothiesSER.name: Chai Bundeva Proteinski Smoothie
ingredients: 2 urme bez koštica (ili drugo zaslađivač kao što je 1/2 kašike javorov sirup)
1 kašičica začina za pite od bundeve
smoothiesSER.instructions: Stavite sve sastojke u šolju blendera, počev od AllVhites® 100% tečnog belanca, završavajući indijskim mlekom. Pogledajte dole navedene napomene u vezi sa smrznutom bundevom u odnosu na sveže i potrebnu količinu mleka. Mešajte dok ne postane glatko. Prebacite smoothie od bundeve u šolju ili šolju, uživajte!

smoothiesSER.name: Kremasti Citrus đumbir Smoothie
ingredients: 2 pomorandže od pupka, oljuštene i segmentirane
1/2 šolje kokosovog mleka (ili mleka po izboru)
svež đumbir, uklonjena kora i iseckan
smoothiesSER.instructions: Dodajte sve sastojke u blender - pobrinite se da su vaše pomorandže segmentirane ako više volite sok od pomorandže bez pulpe. 2. Mešajte dok ne postane glatko. Dodajte još leda ili tečnosti za željenu konzistenciju.

smoothiesSER.name: Antioksidant Smoothie
ingredients: 1 šolja bademovog mleka (po potrebi i više)
smoothiesSER.instructions: Kombinujte sve sastojke, uključujući bademovo mleko, u blenderu velike brzine. Mešajte dok ne postane kremasto, po potrebi dodajte još bademovog mleka.

smoothiesSER.name: Smoothie od banane i kafe
ingredients: 1/2 šolje nezaslađenog bademovog mleka ili mleka po izboru
1/2 šolje sveže pripremljene organske kafe ili hladne kave, stavite u frižider na 10 minuta
1 kašika proteina u prahu (volim peptide kolagena vitalnih proteina)
Opcionalno: 1 kašičica meda ili zaslađivača po izboru
smoothiesSER.instructions: Kombinujte sve sastojke u blenderu velike brzine. Mešajte dok ne postane kremasto. Okusite i dodajte dodatno zaslađivač ako je potrebno.
